title: "Active cases by RLS"
params: 
  optimize: true
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("_R/setup.R")
source("_R/figures_theme.R")
source("_R/CovidFig.R")
load("_data/rls.RData")
```

## {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

### Gatineau & Outaouais
```{r rls_active_gatineau}
rls %>% 
  filter(table == "active" & key %in% c("Active cases (Outaouais)", "RLS de Grande-Rivière - Hull - Gatineau")) %>% 
  CovidFig(caption = "Data source: www.inspq.qc.ca/sites/default/files/covid/donnees/tableau-rls-new.csv")
```
